reference.title: Retrieve the Read-Only Administrator's Name
reference.shortdesc: Only the Full Administrator can retrieve the Read-only Administrator's name using the GET /settings/readOnlyAdminName HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP Method and URI
section.p: To retrieve the read-only username, administrative or read-only permissions are required:

section.title: Response
section.p: If successful, a response is returned with the read-only user name as payload:
If there is no read-only user, the following error is returned:
